title: Welcome to XChango
description: XChango is a barter and trading app where you can exchange goods or services with others

title: How It Works?
description: Trade items or services with others nearby barter directly, add cash if needed, or combine both.

title: Why XChango?
description: Xchango lets you trade smarter save money, reduce waste, and get more from what you already have.

title: Get Started in Minutes
description: Creating your account is quick and easy. Just sign up, list what you have or need, and start exploring nearby trades.
